nodes.title: Fixed some Chinese  and added some newly items.
Bump build tools to latest version
Add posibility to use signing.properties for automatical package signing
Fix deprecation warnings (now errors in 0.14.4) w/ gradle.
app backup fix for L and dialog fix
fixed and added missed translations for russian
fixes for icons and doc opening
added device storages in drawer adapter
implement file picker, includes go back fixes
small fix for color channel variables
fix for last path in tabs
fix for paste in different tabs
partial fix for tab closing feature
spinner dropdown layout and click listener fixes
done most of things except fragment thing
Added support to specify a domain for SMB connection. Made some code refactoring.
Notification for FTP; Service persistence after exit
Enabled FTPService to be restarted on the event of app's exit from recents
Tried fixing dependency problem, fixed FTP button position in toolbar
Update Google Play and F-Droid badges
compatible other devices exclude api 21 for search
Fixed 'New File' FAB action. Was creating a new folder instead of a new file.
New search dialog based on SearchView
Fixed long press Fab issue and changed resource in AnimUtils
a tiny addition to customize the toast on opening
Fix date in file list for root mode
Minor fixes to loading file status and german translation
Sorts -> Sort (in changelog) and portuguese update
Portuguese update and copyright updated to 2015
Fix string comparison to actually compare
Force chooser on open-with, allow default handler for archives
Redefine wp documents as wp documents
Added "polish" to strings and polish translation update
Add Portuguese language/translator to source file and Portuguese update
reload icons if imageId is null
Fix broken headings in Markdown files
Changed names and tried to make the code more understandable at first glance
Duplicate files/folder problem in search bar
'Duplicate folders/files problem in search bar' issue has been fixed
Fixed minor issue with new file creation
reduce memory usage by reusing bitmaps
fix ext sdcard issues with SAF while copy, move and save in text reader
don't recreate SDF for every formatting
Encode username and password separately for SMB URIs. Closes Issue #429
Replace use of getColor call that was needing an API platform version…
AmazeFileManager: replace firstline's TextView to ThemedTextView for rowlayout
AmazeFileManager: Fix app name color at app manager
Add some comments on ThemeManagerInterface, its implementation
Implements UtilitiesProviderInterface in a separate class
Update CircleGradientDrawable: Use device density to transform dp to px
Ftp port can now be selected in the option menu of the FTPServer fragment
FTP port can now be set from preferences
Fixes #349: Hex colors in switch were a mix of lower and upper case ...
Update gradle as Android Studio suggests
Pull getColorPreference in BasicActivity (UtilitiesProviderInterface) instead of BaseActivity
Use static methods with class name and not instance
Comments about methods of ColorUsage and ColorPreference.
Update gradle plugin to last version
Added support for Android N app settings in App info
Adding SwipeRefreshLayout with bottom refresh; Update Russian translations
ELEMENTS_LIST to singleton and truly thread safed
App crashing on opening Download folder in lg g3
Shows indeterminate ProgressDialog while creating copy tree
Fix bug: FTP tile not work with wifi hotspot
Fix bugs in ZIP/RAR paths and cleaned code
Updated android tools and support libs to v26.0.1
Log line was spamming the logcat.
Added leak canary for leak detection
Added setting to open files in new stack
Clean unused resources and improve translation of Chinese
Small bugs in search bar fixed
docs(translate): Improve translation of simple Chinese
Small fixes that don't change the functionality
Changed SwipeRefreshLayout color sheme to accentColor
Allow FTP service to run when wifi AP is enabled
Allow FTP service to run when wifi AP is enabled
FTP Server fixed while using Eth
Fixed 'show files as grid' state not being saved #660
Solved ".." and "." being classified as files
Doesn't fix encryption on api < M
Officially fixes crash when deleting last file...
Added A Feature to Show Keyword of the Search
Title and summary not updating glitch solved
Changed colors of icons in shortcut settings
Changed how ThemedImageView works and solved black shortcut items on dark theme
Solved advanced search not having appbar
Revert "Revert "Added setting to change shortcuts and disable shortcuts and quick accesses""
Solved missing resource crash and Toast glitch
Revert "Added setting to change shortcuts and disable shortcuts and quick accesses"
Added setting to change shortcuts and disable shortcuts and quick accesses
Fix crash when user rotates screen with color picker in settings screen
Migrate PEM passphrase dialog to use generic dialog layout
Use generic dialog layout and WarnableTextInputLayout for mkfile, mkdir and rename (#1020)
Used InvertedRadixTree for GRID/LIST layout setting
Zip filename dialog should allow only values of *.zip
Zip filename dialog should allow only values of *.zip
SftpConnectDialog: Limit port range to 0 < port < 65536
Toggle select/deselect all with selected file/folder count
Clean build and  update simple Chinese
Enabled multi dex support in API < 20
Zip filename dialog should allow only values of *.zip
Fix opening content URIs in TextEditor
fix(build): Fix build fail by increasing dex heap size
Modified disableButton logic for the shortcuts dialog to watch both edit texts for validity
Added accent colors to available colors
Prevent the PreferencesActivity from being restarted when irrelevant preferences are changed
Moved drawer open/close logic to post event
Force texteditor scrollview to fill entire viewport to allow EditText to be full screen
Use statvfs@openssh.com extension to query disk size/available space for SFTP targets
Add FileUtils.folderSizeSftp() for recursive folder size calculation
This deletes an empty file I pushed by mistake
Force using folder icon if isDirectory is true
Revert "Fix app crash on enabling FTP service"
Fix app crash on enabling FTP service
Added a new system to choose colors
Grid view now has rounded background behind icons
Moved header image change to settings
Fixed last drawer items not getting selected and aligned to Android Guidelines
Fix navbar coloration defaulting to true
Code cleanup for Services and ProgressViewerFragment
Minor fixes I forgot to edit out in glide
Updated to Gradle 4.1, plugin 3.0.1 and build tools 26.0.2
- fix crash when adding SMB Connection
docs(translate): Add missing translate of simple Chinese
Deleted strings that shouldn't be translated
Revert "Remove Async inner class from inside method to avoid memory leaks"
The file lists reload in onResume()
Load of small fixes to reduce unused code in utils
